comment: I took Professor Zoe for ART 2990, and she was great. She gave good feedback and responded quickly when I had questions or needed help. I would take her again!

This was actually for art 2990

I would not suggest taking her. She grades you hard, and it's for reasons in which you may not be able to control.

Also get ready to do 3D for most of this class, she will give Bs and Cs for 2D stuff.

Apparently she does not read her own rubric and gives you a lower grade because of it.

She made us buy an expensive set of paints. We did not get to experiment with many mediums gave us little creative freedom on our projects, and we would have to follow these limiting color schemes. Do not try making friends in this class because she will separate you guys and create a seating chart for the class. Not bad other than that
Makes you want to learn more.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: I took 2D Design with Professor Zoe and feel really good about it. She's a younger teacher and has her students call her by her first name, which was a little strange at first but easy to get used to. She's really easy to talk to and gives good feedback on projects and assignments.
